headline: Danaher Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: Danaher Corporation (NYSE: DHR) announced today that its Board of Directors has approved a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.32 per share of its common stock, payable on October 31, 2025 to holders of record on September 26, 2025.

raw.headline: Danaher Announces Quarterly Dividend
raw.summary: Danaher Corporation (NYSE: DHR) announced today that its Board of Directors has approved a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.32 per share of its common stock, payable on October 31, 2025 to holders of record on September 26, 2025.
